emojiful.midnightconfig.enableLoadCustom: Loads custom emojis provided by Emojiful
emojiful.midnightconfig.enableLoadDatapa: Loads datapack emojis provided by the server you join
emojiful.midnightconfig.enableProfanityF: Enable Profanity Filter, this will replace bad words with emoji
emojiful.midnightconfig.loadGifEmojis: Load animated emojis, if disabled they will be a still image
emojiful.midnightconfig.loadTwemoji: Loads Twemojis used in sites like Twitter and Discord
emojiful.midnightconfig.profanityFilterS: Replacement word for the profanity filter
emojiful.midnightconfig.shortEmojiReplac: Replace short versions of emoji like :) into :smile: so they can be rendered as emoji
emojiful.midnightconfig.showEmojiSelecto: Enable Emoji Selection GUI in the chat text line
emojiful.midnightconfig.title: Emojiful
